title: The Queen's Plate
creator_credit: John Howe and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: This film describes the history of Canada’s horse-racing classic, the Queen’s Plate, and the rearing of a contender from its birth to its entry in the peak event. Queen Elizabeth presents the trophy. (Award: Cortina D’Ampezzo.)
creator_credit_for_label: John Howe and National Film Board of Canada
